name: Coconut Crunch Delight
author: Theresa King

ingredients.name: (3.4 oz.) pkg. instant coconut pudding mix

instructions: In a bowl, combine the first five ingredients; press lightly into a greased 13 x 9 x 2 inch baking pan. Bake at 350Â° for 25 to 30 minutes or until golden brown, stirring every 10 minutes to form coarse crumbs. Cool. Divide crumb mixture in half; press half into the same baking pan. In a mixing bowl, beat pudding mixes and milk. Fold in whipped topping; spoon over the crust. Top with remaining crumb mixture. Cover and refrigerate overnight. Garnish with strawberries if desired.
